job_description: Position:We seek a 3rd or 4th year Electrical Engineering Co-op student to join our R&D Electrical Engineering team for an 8-month term effective May 2015.  This co-op position reports to the Team Manager, Electrical Engineering.Key Duties and Responsibilities…about our role• Measure, test, and analyze performance to optimize RF section of RFID system• Calculate, design, and test analogue improvements of the RF section• Design, build, and test digital electronics including a motor voltage, current probe and printed circuit board• Analyze and troubleshoot analog and digital electronics
job_requirements: Key Skills and Qualifications…about our requirements• Solid academic performance• Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal• Superior analytical and problem solving skills• Top-notch interpersonal and teamwork skills with strong customer service orientation• Detail oriented, procedural in work flow, aptitude for accuracy• Solid organizational skills• Able to work effectively independently or as part of a multi-disciplinary team• Able to prioritize and manage multiple, competing tasks in fast paced, dynamic environment• Possess a strong can do attitude and hands on approach to deliver superior resultsOpen To All Majors:No
